title: My Goal in 2025 Is to Look Elegant, Effortless, and Classy—47 Sale Finds That Nail the Brief
description: Deep discounts from Aritzia, Mango, J.Crew, and Banana Republic right this way.
excerpt: We're sharing the most elegant sale finds from Aritzia, Mango, J.Crew, and Banana Republic.
text: (Image credit: Getty Images)As you can see from my headline, effortless elegance is my style mantra in 2025, and I'm determined to keep my shopping focused on pieces that reflect that sensibility. Think elevated basics, modern silhouettes, and quality pieces that are timeless in nature.Building a refined-looking wardrobe sounds like it could get pricey, which is why I often turn to some of my favorite retailer's sale sections to do some digging. It's amazing to see the stylish treasures that can be found amongst all the marked down pieces. I turned to four retailers this week—Mango, Aritzia, Banana Republic, and J.Crew—all known for their chic and elevated offerings, and all of which happen to be having some big sales right now. After plenty of searching I found some incredibly chic and classy items that are guaranteed to add an elegant touch to my 2025 wardrobe. From classic coats to sophisticated knits, keep scrolling below for my edit of rich-looking finds that won't break the bank.Mango MANGO Oversized V-Neck Sweater The statement V ribbing adds a chic touch. MANGO Wool Coat With Fringed Scarf I'm obsessed with this coat—you can wear it with or without the fashion-forward fringe shawl. MANGO Buttoned Lyocell T-Shirt An everyday tee that feels cool. MANGO Cotton Trench Coat With Belt I love the silhouette of this trench. MANGO Regular Cotton Lyocell-Blend Shirt Time to update your classic button-down. MANGO Long Structured Wool Coat Elegant, versatile, and chic. MANGO Leather Bowling Bag With Buckle It's all about East-West bags right now. MANGO Straight-Fit Pleated Trousers The trousers you'll reach for on repeat. Lean into the sheer trend in a subtle way. MANGO Knitted Coat With Detachable Scarf This elegant knit coat is selling out fast. MANGO Short-Sleeved Fine-Knit Sweater A fine knit sweater that you can style with literally everything. MANGO Straight-Fit Pleated Trousers Straight-leg tailored trousers are having a major moment in 2025. MANGO Cropped Jacket With Buttons Style with relaxed low-rise jeans for a fashion-forward look. MANGO V-Neck Knit Sweater Get in on this season's biggest color trends—powder pink. MANGO Flared Skirt With Pleated Detail Wear now with a sweater and boots, and later with a tank top and sandals. MANGO Waxed-Effect Short Parka MANGO Tweed Jacket With Pockets Love that '90s fitted look. Aritzia An elegant vest you can wear day or night. Wilfred New Generation Linen Blazer Guaranteed you'll be wearing this on repeat come spring. Our editors love collarless blazers. Babaton Everyday Hip T-Shirt aritzia Clara Merino Wool Sweater A striped sweater is always a good idea. aritzia The Effortless Short Linen Mid-Thigh I'm already starting to plan for the warm weather season. Artizia The Effortless Pant Aritzia's Effortless Pants are one of my all time favorite silhouettes. J.Crew jcrew Belted Sweater Shell in Merino Wool That chic belt detail though! jcrew Andi Ballet Flats in Leather jcrew High Rib Pullover Sweater in Wool Blend I'll be styling this sweater with the silky lace skirt below. jcrew Gwen Lace-Trim Slip Skirt in Textured Satin I've had my eye on this skirt for a long time—and it's finally on sale. jcrew Edie Accordion Bag in Snake-Embossed Italian Leather Elevate your entire outfit with this elegant bag. jcrew Vintage Rib Shelf-Bra Tank Top The perfect layering tank. jcrew Perforated Italian Leather Belt This will pull together your outfit in an instant. jcrew New Stevie Ankle Boots in Leather The perfect black ankle boots *do* exist. jcrew New Relaxed Emilie Sweater Lady Jacket in Stripe This will be my spring go-to. jcrew Berkeley Suede and Leather Shoulder Bag J.Crew's bags are top notch. jcrew Cinched-Waist Sweater-Jacket Lean into spring's butter yellow color trend with this lovely sweater-jacket. jcrew Sculptural Orb Earrings Everyday earrings that feel fashion-forward. Banana Republic Banana Republic Classic Poplin Shirt A purchase you won't regret. Banana Republic Forever Short-Sleeve Sweater Very into this relaxed silhouette. Banana Republic Ribbed Racer Tank Banana Republic Sculpted Straight Pant Banana Republic V-Neck Pullover Style with white tailored trousers and a chic belt. Banana Republic Timeless Crew-Neck T-Shirt Now is the perfect time to get my hands on a new white tee. Banana Republic Timeless Trench Coat Banana Republic make good trench coats.
html:
As you can see from my headline, effortless elegance is my style mantra in 2025, and I'm determined to keep my shopping focused on pieces that reflect that sensibility. Think elevated basics, modern silhouettes, and quality pieces that are timeless in nature.

Building a refined-looking wardrobe sounds like it could get pricey, which is why I often turn to some of my favorite retailer's sale sections to do some digging. It's amazing to see the stylish treasures that can be found amongst all the marked down pieces. I turned to four retailers this week—Mango, Aritzia, Banana Republic, and J.Crew—all known for their chic and elevated offerings, and all of which happen to be having some big sales right now. After plenty of searching I found some incredibly chic and classy items that are guaranteed to add an elegant touch to my 2025 wardrobe. From classic coats to sophisticated knits, keep scrolling below for my edit of rich-looking finds that won't break the bank.

Mango

MANGO

Oversized V-Neck Sweater

The statement V ribbing adds a chic touch.

I'm obsessed with this coat—you can wear it with or without the fashion-forward fringe shawl.
